name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Crypto Prices in your favourite currency

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A neat popup window shows the top 10 Crypto prices in your currency (USD, GBP, CAD, EUR, AUD, INR). No Ads, No tracking, Just prices

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CryptoBeats displays the most popular crypto coin prices in various currencies. That's it, and no extra added garbage, tracking software or 3rd party ads pushed down your throat.

A neat pop-up window shows you the top 10 Crypto prices in your currency (USD, GBP, CAD, EUR, AUD, INR). Currently, offering the following currencies Bitcoin, Ethereum, Binance-coin, tether, Solana, USD-coin, Cardana, Ripple, Polkadot, Dogecoin.

You can customise your currency of choice in options so that you always see your favourite currency/country when you open the extension.

Check my website https://MrMarketingMustache.com/ as I have many more chrome plugins which are helpful.

Other Chrome extensions:

https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/aghcmimfdbdnepgdmffnmbdacgajdngo/
